Detailed Description

Modify Instance Attribute Request.

Member Function Documentation

- (void EC2ModifyInstanceAttributeRequest.)addBlockDeviceMapping: (EC2InstanceBlockDeviceMappingSpecification *)  blockDeviceMapping  

Adds a single object to blockDeviceMappings.

This function will alloc and init blockDeviceMappings if not already done.

- (NSString * EC2ModifyInstanceAttributeRequest.)description  

Returns a string representation of this object; useful for testing and debugging.

Returns:
A string representation of this object.
- (id EC2ModifyInstanceAttributeRequest.)init  

Default constructor for a new ModifyInstanceAttributeRequest object.

Callers should use the property methods to initialize this object after creating it.

- (id EC2ModifyInstanceAttributeRequest.)initWithInstanceId: (NSString *)  theInstanceId
andAttribute: (NSString *)  theAttribute 

Constructs a new ModifyInstanceAttributeRequest object.

Callers should use properties to initialize any additional object members.

Parameters:
theInstanceId The ID of the instance whose attribute is being modified.
theAttribute The name of the attribute being modified.

Available attribute names: instanceType, kernel, ramdisk, userData, disableApiTermination, instanceInitiatedShutdownBehavior, rootDevice, blockDeviceMapping

Property Documentation

- (NSString *) attribute [read, write, retain]

The name of the attribute being modified.

Available attribute names: instanceType, kernel, ramdisk, userData, disableApiTermination, instanceInitiatedShutdownBehavior, rootDevice, blockDeviceMapping

- (NSMutableArray *) blockDeviceMappings [read, write, retain]

The new block device mappings for the instance whose attributes are being modified.

Only valid when blockDeviceMapping is specified as the attribute being modified.

- (NSString *) value [read, write, retain]

The new value of the instance attribute being modified.

Only valid when kernel, ramdisk, userData, disableApiTermination or instanceInitiateShutdownBehavior is specified as the attribute being modified.
